## EXPORT\_FRAGCOL variable

GLSL version specific fragment shader output. If `__VERSION__ >= 300` assigns `body` to `out`<!-- -->, else to `gl_FragColor`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
EXPORT_FRAGCOL: (body?: string, out?: string) => string
```
